sdia_python.lab2.box_window.estimate_pi()[source]¶

Estimating pi using the rejection sampling method

Parameters

n (int, optional) – number of iterations for pi estimation. Defaults to int(1e5).

Returns

list of all estimations of pi (last should be the more accurate)
